participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Sociable and creative, but struggles with focus.
participant_1.background: I wish i could be more serious about school. I have been in a lot of romantic relationships that have ended up poorly. I have lots of friends and can hold a conversation easily. I get distracted easily.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Passionate about music and food, confident and active.
participant_2.background: I love to eat shrimp and lobster. I vacation along lake michigan every summer. My favorite drink is iced coffee. I have a black belt in karate. I am in a jazz band and play the saxophone.

content.text: What do you like to do for fun?
I like to play music, go on vacation, and eat seafood.
That's cool! I like to play video games, go out with friends, and read.
I've never been very good at video games, but I love reading. What are some of your favorite books?
I like to read a lot of different things, but I'm really into fantasy and science fiction.
Me too! I love the Lord of the Rings series and The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy.
I love those books too! I'm also a big fan of the Wheel of Time series and the Dune series.
I've never heard of those, but I'll have to check them out.
You should! They're both really good.
So, what are you doing this summer?
I'm not sure yet. I'm thinking about going on vacation, but I'm not sure where yet.
I'm going to vacation in Lake Michigan with my family. It's a beautiful place.
That sounds nice! I've never been to Lake Michigan before.
You should go! It's a great place to relax and have fun.
Maybe I will. Thanks for the suggestion.
